name: Gold key
description: Mysterious creature kidnapped our hero's beloved. Help the protagonist to pass all the trials and save his beloved!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
